comment: A property related to substitution that unlike ~ equs5 does not require a distinctor antecedent. See ~ equs5eALT for an alternate proof using ~ ax-12 but not ~ ax13 . (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 15-Jan-2018.)
